title: What has to be done to add a Operation
body_html:
Hi there, when I was viewing source code. I found this comment:

pytorch/aten/src/ATen/function_wrapper.py

Line 2 in 0d5e4a2

# "what has to be done to add a Operation ..." first!

But I can't find any document in this project explains it nor can't find any resource has similar tittle on the internet. Only https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/notes/extending.html has a relativity of it.

Where can I found the content or what should this line correct to?
Thanks a lot.
body_text:

body:
Hi there, when I was viewing source code. I found this comment:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/0d5e4a2c66816e42d084f23ee94575357460cdf8/aten/src/ATen/function_wrapper.py#L2

But I can't find any document in this project explains it nor can't find any resource has similar tittle on the internet. Only https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/notes/extending.html has a relativity of it.

Where can I found the content or what should this line correct to?
Thanks a lot.
